description:
Pierrot is at death’s door and everyone is scrambling to save him! However, he has a rare blood type and no one knows any donors… but what’s this? The King has the same blood type?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Reunited in the VIP Section!! Heaven Again!
VIP Seki de Saikai!! Heaven Again!
VIP席で再会!! ヘブン・アゲイン!
พบกัน ณ ที่นั่ง VIP!! เฮเว่น.อเกน!
